patterns_discovered: Prop drilling for filter reset functionality
Conditional rendering based on view state
Default empty array fallback for incidents list
gotchas_discovered: Need to pass onResetFilters prop through component hierarchy
Potential undefined incidents array handled with fallback

approach_outcome.changes_summary: Added onResetFilters prop to IncidentList component

recommendations: Consistently implement prop drilling for state management functions
Use TypeScript to enforce prop types and prevent potential undefined scenarios
Consider implementing a more centralized state management solution if prop drilling becomes complex
